content: Aztec is a privacy-first zk-rollup on Ethereum bringing confidentiality and cost savings to the Ethereum ecosystem.
name: Aztec

content: Balancer is a decentralized protocol that provides DeFi liquidity infrastructure.
name: Balancer

content: mStable is an autonomous and non-custodial infrastructure for yield products.
name: mStable

content: Superform is the universal yield marketplace. It allows protocols to list vaults and users to deposit instantly with any asset on any chain.
name: Superform

content: Sommelier is an automated portfolio management and strategy platform building dynamic, intelligent vaults.
name: Sommelier Finance

content: Alchemix is a future-yield-backed synthetic asset protocol and community DAO.
name: Alchemix

content: Frax is a fractional reserve stablecoin and crypto native consumer price index protocol.
name: Frax Finance

content: Joey was one of the creators of the ERC-4626 standard and founded Fei Protocol.
name: Joey Santoro
